testcase.classname: As a Customer I want to find a desired camera and add it to the cart and validate sub total price
testcase.name: Product page subtotal price sum is correct
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Amazon homepage.........................................passed Then I see the homepage.....................................................passed When I enter Best Sellers in Digital Cameras................................passed Then I see the products associated..........................................passed When I select product Amcrest ProHD 1080P WiFi Camera 2MP (1920TVL) Indoor Pan/Tilt Security Wireless IP Camera IP2M-841B (Black).passed Then I see the product page with Add to cart button.........................passed And I see the Product price per item is displayed...........................passed And increase the quantity to 8..............................................passed When I click Add to cart button.............................................passed Then I check that correct product Amcrest ProHD 1080P WiFi Camera 2MP (1920TVL) Indoor Pan/Tilt Security Wireless IP Camera IP2M-841B (Black) is added.passed And I see the subtotal price sum is correct.................................passed
